4II.F.summary: Instalco AB (publ) provides installation services in the heating and plumbing, electrical, ventilation, cooling, and industrial areas in Sweden and rest of Nordic. The company offers district heating, natural gas, heat pumps, tunnel pipes, and comfort cooling installation; sprinkler systems; water treatment and water consumption; pipe replacement and preventative maintenance; new construction; ongoing repairs; project planning; and service and maintenance services. It also provides electricity services, including design, project planning, and assembly services; alarms and monitoring; technical equipment data network and control; energy optimization through integrated property automation; charging posts for electric cars; remote reading; and service and maintenance. In addition, the company offers ventilation installation services and solutions for indoor climate, air treatment, energy optimization, ventilation inspection, project planning, and service and maintenance; cooling and heating equipment installation, food and comfort cooling, process cooling, and service and maintenance; pipe and cooling installation services, as well as engages in electrical installations, infrastructure, automation, instrumentation, emission control, energy, and safety services; and exhaust gas cleaning and project planning services. It serves construction firms; government agencies, local authorities, and regions; retail chains; food industry; institutional kitchens; hotels; administrations; and property owners industries, as well as housing, property, cold storage, industrial construction shipping, maritime transport, installation, energy, and industrial companies. The company was formerly known as Instalco Intressenter AB (publ) and changed its name to Instalco AB (publ) in May 2019. Instalco AB (publ) was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

7EVB.F.summary: Eolus Vind AB (publ) primarily engages in the development, establishment, and operation of facilities for renewable energy and energy storage in the Nordic region, Sweden, Norway, Finland, Baltic countries, and the United States. The company operates through three segments: Project Development, Asset Management, and Electricity Generation. It engages in the operation of wind turbines; production and sale of electricity; and sale of electricity certificates. The company is also involved in the pre-study, project development, and establishment of wind power facilities. In addition, it offers asset management services to the owners of wind power facilities. Further, the company invests in wind power projects; and provides technical and management consultancy services for wind power stakeholders. Eolus Vind AB (publ) was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in HÃ¤ssleholm, Sweden.

7W71.F.summary: Sweco AB (publ) provides consulting services in engineering, environmental technology, and architecture fields worldwide. The company undertakes culture, leisure, sports, education, interior architecture, office, landscape architecture, visualization, urban development, infrastructure, housing, lighting design, cultural environment, retail and commercial, healthcare, and industry projects. It also provides renewable fuels, combined heating and power, dams, due diligence, district heating and cooling, electrical power, electricity distribution, energy efficiency enhancement, energy market and strategy, energy storage, hydropower, power transmission, solar energy, and wind power energy systems. In addition, the company offers steel structure, BIM, building construction design, building engineering physics and energy, construction administration, industrial construction design, prefabricated structure, and physical protection structural engineering services. Further, it provides bridge and tunnel engineering, cargo and logistics, electrical and geotechnical engineering, ITS and traffic system, measurement technology, port and marina engineering, public transportation, railway and rock engineering, risk management and safety, signaling, and traffic and urban planning services; and road, street, and land planning services, as well as Geolab, which performs geotechnical analyses of the nutrient values in gardening soils or contaminated sites. Additionally, the company offers electricity and automation, plant design, process engineering, and logistics services; HVAC and sanitation, fire engineering and risk analysis, electrical systems, physical protection, environment and energy, telecom system, lighting design, parametric design, and monitoring and inspection services for buildings; IT solution for urban development; and project management, social analysis, and water and environment services. Sweco AB (publ) is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

83A.F.summary: Fasadgruppen Group AB (publ) operates as a full-service provider of facades in Sweden and Nordic region. It offers masonry services, such as jointing, anchoring, and insulation of brick facades; and brick services, as well as masonry of plinths, shell walls, interior walls, and unfolding walls. The company also undertakes plastering and works with facades on old and new buildings; and various works, such as replacing old windows with modern windows, renovating windows and balconies, extension and glazing of existing balconies, and installation of windows and balconies. In addition, it undertakes works of renovation and installation of roofs; and concrete, layers waterproofing, carbon fiber reinforcement, and tile and clinker works for renovation and construction markets, as well as rents scaffolding for construction works, such as lifts, loaders, and protective equipment. The company was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

B3Y1.F.summary: ÃF PÃ¶yry AB (publ) provides engineering, design, and advisory services for the infrastructure, industry, energy, and digitalisation in Sweden, Finland, Norway, Switzerland, Denmark, Germany, and internationally. The company operates in five divisions: Infrastructure, Industrial & Digital Solutions, Process Industries, Energy, and Management Consulting. It provides architecture and design, facility availability and risk management, process measurements, measurement and analysis of flue gas emissions, enhancing district heating and cooling, wind power measurements, BAT expertise, social responsibility development, plant's environmental responsibility development, asset management, permitting and authority issues, safety management, risk analyses, automation and controls, real virtual commissioning, robot programming & olp, industrial digitalization, installation and commissioning, and industrial digitalisation advisory services. The company also offers expert surveys, second opinion surveys, due diligences, risk assessments, optimization surveys, carbon and water footprint calculations, and process safety consulting services. In addition, it provides process engineering, plant and layout design, piping and mechanical engineering, process automation, instrumentation and ICT engineering, process electrical engineering, heat, ventilation, and air conditioning, civil and structural engineering, and electrification, fire, safety and security services. Further, the company provides project management, environmental impact assessments, land use and urban planning, permitting, nature inventories and protection, environment, health and safety audits, waste management, and contaminated soil management services. ÃF PÃ¶yry AB (publ) serves IT, defense, energy, forest, chemical, bio-refining, metal and mining, and bio-based industries. The company was founded in 1895 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

BRAV.ST.summary: Bravida Holding AB (publ) provides technical services and installations for buildings and industrial facilities in Sweden, Norway, Denmark, and Finland. The company offers installation services for the new construction and refurbishment of technical systems in buildings, facilities, and infrastructure; and operation and maintenance services, as well as undertakes minor upgrade works. It also provides technical and installation services for electrical, heating, and plumbing systems, as well as heating, ventilation, and air conditioning systems in buildings and commercial facilities; and installs and services security and sprinkler systems, cooling and power facilities, lifts, solar panels, and services within project management, technical service management, energy optimization, technical property service, and uninterrupted technical infrastructure. The company primarily serves property owners, public sector, professional tenants, building contractors, and industrial companies. Bravida Holding AB (publ) was founded in 1922 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

BV0.F.summary: Bravida Holding AB (publ) provides technical services and installations for buildings and industrial facilities in Sweden, Norway, Denmark, and Finland. The company offers installation services for the new construction and refurbishment of technical systems in buildings, facilities, and infrastructure; and operation and maintenance services, as well as undertakes minor upgrade works. It also provides technical and installation services for electrical, heating, and plumbing systems, as well as heating, ventilation, and air conditioning systems in buildings and commercial facilities; and installs and services security and sprinkler systems, cooling and power facilities, lifts, solar panels, and services within project management, technical service management, energy optimization, technical property service, and uninterrupted technical infrastructure. The company primarily serves property owners, public sector, professional tenants, building contractors, and industrial companies. Bravida Holding AB (publ) was founded in 1922 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

BYGGP.ST.summary: ByggPartner i Dalarna Holding AB (publ) operates as a construction company. The company contacts various projects within housing, community, and commercial properties; and provides building services. It also undertakes various scaffolding projects primarily in housing and industry, as well as engages in the property development activities. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in BorlÃ¤nge, Sweden.

CBTT-B.ST.summary: Christian Berner Tech Trade AB (publ) supplies technical components, equipment, and materials to businesses and public sector organizations in the Nordic countries. Its materials technology business is focused on the sale of a range of materials, including plastics, and vibration-damping and noise-reduction solutions; and process and environment business focus on customers with a need for process equipment and turnkey systems. The company is also involved in the provision of consultation, analysis of the customer's technical requirements, development, installation, and services. It primarily serves pulp and paper, engineering, construction, and food industries, as well as petrochemicals and refineries. Christian Berner Tech Trade AB (publ) was founded in 1897 and is headquartered in MÃ¶lnlycke, Sweden.

E5E.F.summary: Eltel AB (publ) provides technical services for the power and communication infrastructure networks in Sweden, Finland, Norway, Poland, Denmark, Germany, and internationally. The company builds, maintains, and upgrades power transmission systems, as well as supplies power distribution services. It also designs, plans, builds, installs, upgrades, operates, and services mobile and fixed networks. In addition, the company offers maintenance services, which comprise scheduled and corrective care services and connect services; upgrade and conversion services to recover and upgrade the condition or technology of an existing infrastructure network; and project delivery services, which include engineering and delivering customer specific network infrastructure projects. It provides its services to national transmission system operators, power distribution grids, telecom operators, and other communication network owners. The company is headquartered in Bromma, Sweden.

ELTEL.ST.summary: Eltel AB (publ) provides technical services for the power and communication infrastructure networks in Sweden, Finland, Norway, Poland, Denmark, Germany, and internationally. The company builds, maintains, and upgrades power transmission systems, as well as supplies power distribution services. It provides its services to national transmission system operators, power distribution grids, telecom operators, and other communication network owners. The company is headquartered in Bromma, Sweden.

HIFA-B.ST.summary: Hifab Group AB (publ), together with its subsidiaries, provides project management and consulting services in Sweden, Asia, Africa, and rest of Europe. It offers project management services in the building, construction, environment, energy, real estate, and process technology sectors. The company was founded in 1947 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

The company offers district heating, natural gas, heat pumps, tunnel pipes, and comfort cooling installation; sprinkler systems; water treatment and water consumption; pipe replacement and preventative maintenance; new construction; ongoing repairs; project planning; and service and maintenance services. It serves construction firms; government agencies, local authorities, and regions; retail chains; food industry; institutional kitchens; hotels; administrations; and property owners industries, as well as housing, property, cold storage, industrial construction shipping, maritime transport, installation, energy, and industrial companies. NCC-B.ST.summary: NCC AB (publ) operates as a construction and property development company in Sweden, Norway, Denmark, and Finland. It operates through five segments: NCC Infrastructure, NCC Building Sweden, NCC Building Nordic, NCC Industry, and NCC Property Development. The company builds housing and offices, as well as constructs schools, hospitals, stores, and warehouses. It also designs and constructs infrastructure projects, such as tunnels, roads, and railways. In addition, the company produces stone materials and asphalt, as well as engages in piling works and paving. Further, it develops and sells commercial properties in metropolitan regions in Sweden, Norway, Denmark, and Finland. The company was incorporated in 1935 and is headquartered in Solna, Sweden.

NCGB.F.summary: NCC AB (publ) operates as a construction and property development company in Sweden, Norway, Denmark, and Finland. It operates through five segments: NCC Infrastructure, NCC Building Sweden, NCC Building Nordic, NCC Industry, and NCC Property Development. The company builds housing and offices, as well as constructs schools, hospitals, stores, and warehouses. It also designs and constructs infrastructure projects, such as tunnels, roads, and railways. In addition, the company produces stone materials and asphalt, as well as engages in piling works and paving. Further, it develops and sells commercial properties in metropolitan regions in Sweden, Norway, Denmark, and Finland. The company was incorporated in 1935 and is headquartered in Solna, Sweden.

PEAB-B.ST.summary: Peab AB (publ) operates as a construction and civil engineering company primarily in Sweden, Norway, Denmark, and Finland. It operates through four segments: Construction, Civil Engineering, Industry, and Project Development. The Construction segment constructs homes, and public and commercial properties; and provides renovations, rebuilding and extensions, and construction maintenance services. The Civil Engineering segment constructs and maintains roads, railroads, bridges, tunnels, ports, and other infrastructure. This segment also undertakes landscaping, pipeline, and foundation works, as well as operates and maintains highways and street networks, tends parks, outdoor properties, and water and sewage supply networks. The Industry segment offers products and services for construction and civil engineering projects. It provides mineral aggregates, concrete, paving, and temporary electricity to prefabricated concrete elements. This segment is also involved in the crane and machine rental; distribution of binder to the concrete industry; transportation and recycling of production waste and excavated soil. The Project Development segment acquires, develops, and divests residential and commercial properties. It serves Swedish transport administration, municipalities, and local businesses. The company was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in FÃ¶rslÃ¶v, Sweden.

PEKB.F.summary: Peab AB (publ) operates as a construction and civil engineering company primarily in Sweden, Norway, Denmark, and Finland. It operates through four segments: Construction, Civil Engineering, Industry, and Project Development. The Construction segment constructs homes, and public and commercial properties; and provides renovations, rebuilding and extensions, and construction maintenance services. The Civil Engineering segment constructs and maintains roads, railroads, bridges, tunnels, ports, and other infrastructure. This segment also undertakes landscaping, pipeline, and foundation works, as well as operates and maintains highways and street networks, tends parks, outdoor properties, and water and sewage supply networks. The Industry segment offers products and services for construction and civil engineering projects. It provides mineral aggregates, concrete, paving, and temporary electricity to prefabricated concrete elements. This segment is also involved in the crane and machine rental; distribution of binder to the concrete industry; transportation and recycling of production waste and excavated soil. The Project Development segment acquires, develops, and divests residential and commercial properties. It serves Swedish transport administration, municipalities, and local businesses. The company was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in FÃ¶rslÃ¶v, Sweden.

PENG-B.ST.summary: Projektengagemang Sweden AB (publ) operates as an engineering and architecture consulting company in Sweden. It operates through three segments: Architecture & Management, Civil Engineering & Infrastructure, and Systems. The Architecture & Management segment offers urban planning, architecture, landscape architecture and interior architecture, as well as project management and consulting on various stages of the building process and societal development and sustainability. The Civil Engineering & Infrastructure segment provides services in the areas of building design; acoustics; geotechnics; energy, environment and sustainability; bridge and civil engineering design; and railways, roads, water treatment, and environmental impact. The Systems segment offers services in the field of HVAC and sanitation design; electrical and telecommunications engineering; and security, fire protection, sprinkler systems, automation, and digitalization. Projektengagemang Sweden AB (publ) was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

SEMC.ST.summary: Semcon AB (publ) operates as a technology company in the fields of engineering services and product information in Sweden, Norway, Brazil, the United Kingdom, and internationally. The company operates through the Engineering & Digital Services and Product Information segments. It provides engineering services with in product development, plant engineering, and production development areas; and assist customers to develop products, systems, and plants providing solutions along the entire development chain, from studies to specific requirements to the finished product. In addition, the company offers product information solutions, including aftermarket product information, and information distribution and management solutions that support customers' products throughout the product lifecycle for sales and marketing, installation, diagnostics, maintenance, repairs, and training material for service staff. It serves automotive, telecom, IT, industrial machinery and equipment, and energy sectors. Semcon AB (publ) was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Gothenburg, Sweden.

SKA-B.ST.summary: Skanska AB (publ) operates as a construction and project development company in the Nordic region, Europe, and the United States. It operates through Construction, Residential Development, and Commercial Property Development segments. The Construction segment builds and renovates buildings, industrial facilities, infrastructure projects, and home projects; and executes service-related assignments in areas, such as construction services, and facility operations and maintenance services. The Residential Development segment develops and sells residential projects, including single and multi-family housing. The Commercial Property Development segment initiates, invests in, develops, leases, and divests in commercial properties. Skanska AB (publ) was founded in 1887 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

SRNKE-B.ST.summary: Serneke Group AB (publ) operates as a construction company primarily in the regions of Gothenburg, Stockholm, and MalmÃ¶. The company operates through Construction, Civil Engineering, and Project Development segments. It is involved in the construction of housing, commercial, and public properties. The company also undertakes earth, foundation, infrastructure, electrical grid, power plant, harbor contract, industrial, earth and excavation, and concrete project works. In addition, it engages in the acquisition, development, and sale of land for residential and commercial properties. Further, the company provides property management services. It serves municipal and private property, state-owned, project development, and industrial companies; central government, municipalities, and county councils; and authorities and developers of commercial centers. Serneke Group AB (publ) was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Gothenburg, Sweden.

WAA.F.summary: Wastbygg Gruppen AB operates as a construction and property development company in Sweden, Norway, and Denmark. It operates through three segments: Residential, Commercial, and Logistics and Industry. The Residential segment develops and produces multi-dwelling buildings. The Commercial segment constructs commercial and community properties, office buildings, and hotels. The Logistics and Industry segment constructs and develops logistics and industrial properties. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Gothenburg, Sweden. Wastbygg Gruppen AB is a subsidiary of M2 Holding AB.
